definitions.definition: To produce an object identical to a given object.
definitions.example: Please copy these reports for me.

definitions.definition: To give or transmit a copy to (a person).
definitions.example: Make sure you copy me on that important memo.

definitions.definition: To place a copy of an object in memory for later use.
definitions.example: First copy the files, and then paste them in another directory.

definitions.definition: An instance of the making of a copy
The practice of making one or more copies
